ENGLISH: Ratified the Vienna Convention on Diplomatic Relations
Vienna Convention on Diplomatic Relations Delay
Ratify the Convention on Diplomatic Relations

Ratify the Vienna Convention on Diplomatic Relations. This treaty specifies the privileges of a diplomatic mission that enable diplomats to perform their function without fear of coercion or harassment by the host country, forming the legal basis for diplomatic immunity. It establishes a set of obligations that signatory host owe to the diplomatic staff of foreign states and will bring some semblance of order and predictability to consular activities.
We have ratified the Vienna Convention on Diplomatic Relations.
